item.title: Math symbols ~ Tau should be ◯
item.description: What is a mathematical symbol ? A mathematical symbol is the projection of an abstract concept on a small 2D plane section. As human memory is limited and costly, we should strive to make the unprojection as painless as possible. That means good symbols. They should scale well, and be as different to one another as the concepts are. π is not the most elegant constant For starters, read the Tau manifesto.
